title: Reduce Hourglas cooldown to 60 seconds so we can have some counterplay to Zed as adc
body:
Since qss doesn't remove zeds ult anymore the only way to deal with him as ADC is to... well buy zhonyas.
since zhonyas is very expensive and on most adc's doesn't give any stats except it's active cooldown should be reduced.
BUT THAT'S OP WTF ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? well.. zed's ult cd is very short. shorter than zhonyas, he can use it twice in 1 long fight.

solution? bring back QSS or buff zhonyas.
